segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching as high as he can.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, like it's going to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the girl waiting patiently for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful and happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they make a good team, these two.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really risking a lot for those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl seems to trust him completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is a risky game they're playing, but it's kind of sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR
